title: Spectrum
responsibilities: Worked under Senior Engineer on Ruby on Rails application utilizing Haml, Sass, Postgres, Redis, RSpec, Codeship, Heroku, and AWS
Effectively translated client requirements into application design and system requirements utilizing Scrum framework
Created admin protected dashboards for business analytics and capturing lost opportunities
Migrated race registration pages from Haml to React single page application to solve state management issues with multi-step form
Stabilized application by taking test coverage from 9.22% to 54.49%
Worked well independently and remotely within a team setting using Slack, Pivotal Tracker, and Google Meet

title: Under Armour
responsibilities: Started on internal tools team and quickly moved up the engineering ladder to work on MapMy Run (10M user base) and Seabiscuit (Performance clone for underarmour.com product description pages using GraphQL, TypeScript, and NextJS)
Primary developer and Product Owner for Jackfruit challenges admin tool
Implemented test driven development to maintain clean and manageable code, unit testing with Jest
Worked with QA and support team to diagnose and fix bugs
Created NPM package with unit conversion tables for duration, distance, and time to be used across suite of applications

title: Unity

Migrated components from Unity One (MUI 4 base) component library to Cloud Foundation design system (MUI 5 base) Storybook components

Completed Unity Leadership training and Unity “Certified Interviewer” involved in the intern program
